flavor_text:
[バトル開始から数えて1ターン目と4ターン目の行動選択前]
味方パーティ生存者全体と敵パーティ全体に、「攻撃強化(1回)」( 効果大/効果1ターン )を付与する
flavor_text_en:
[Counting from the start of the battle before action selection on the 1st and 4th turns]
Grant “ Attack Enhancement (1 time)” (large effect/ effect 1 turn) to all allied party survivors and all enemy parties
name: 捲土

flavor_text:
[バトル開始から数えて3ターン目のターン終了時]
味方パーティ生存者全体に「消費BP増加」( 増加量1/効果バトル中永続 )を付与する
flavor_text_en:
[At the end of the 3rd turn counting from the start of the battle]
Grant “BP consumption increase” (increase amount 1/effect lasts during battle) to all allied party survivors
name: 氷獄

flavor_text:
[ターン終了時]
味方パーティ生存者全体のHPを割合回復する( 対象の最大HPの5% )
flavor_text_en:
[At end of turn]
Recover a percentage of HP from all allied party survivors (5% of the target's maximum HP)
name: 生転

flavor_text:
[ターン終了時]
味方パーティ生存者全体に、割合ダメージを与える( 対象の最大HPの5% )
※割合ダメージは被ダメージ軽減効果によって軽減できない
flavor_text_en:
[At end of turn]
Deal percentage damage to all
allied party survivors (5% of the target's maximum HP) *Percentage damage cannot be reduced by damage reduction effects
name: 炎獄

flavor_text:
[バトル開始から数えて偶数ターン目のターン終了時]
味方パーティ生存者全体に「最大BP減少」( 減少量1/効果バトル中永続 )を付与する
flavor_text_en:
[At the end of the even-numbered turn counting from the start of the battle]
Grant “maximum BP reduction” (reduction amount 1/effect lasts during battle) to all allied party survivors
name: 神託
